mov_subjid.title: Moving subject
mov_subjid.description: FreeSurfer subject name as found in $SUBJECTS_DIR. This identifies the subject that is to be moved / registered to the target.

template_subjid.title: Template subject
template_subjid.description: FreeSurfer subject name as found in $SUBJECTS_DIR (or --templatedir). This identifies the subject that is to be kept fixed (template).

templatedir.title: Template directory
templatedir.description: Directory of the template subject's SUBJECTS_DIR if different from that of the moving subject.

mni_flag.title: MNI flag
mni_flag.description: Use the CVS atlas in MNI152 space as a target for registration.

outdir.title: Output directory
outdir.description: Name of the output directory where all the registration results are written.

asegfname.title: Segmentation volume name
asegfname.description: Name of the segmentation volume used in volumetric registration step. Do not use the file extension.

voltype.title: Volume type
voltype.description: Changes the input from norm.mgz to voltype.mgz.

noaseg_flag.title: No aseg flag
noaseg_flag.description: Do not use aseg volumes in the volumetric registration pipeline.

nointensity_flag.title: No intensity flag
nointensity_flag.description: Do not use intensity volumes in the volumetric registration pipeline.

hemi_flag.title: Hemisphere flag
hemi_flag.description: Run CVS registration only on one hemisphere.

masktargethemi_flag.title: Mask target hemisphere flag
masktargethemi_flag.description: Use with --hemi when hemi is registered to full brain target.

maskmovinghemi_flag.title: Mask moving hemisphere flag
maskmovinghemi_flag.description: Use with --hemi when full brain is registered to single hemi target.

keepelreg_flag.title: Keep elastic registration flag
keepelreg_flag.description: Do not delete elastic registration outcomes.

keepallm3z_flag.title: Keep all m3z flag
keepallm3z_flag.description: Do not delete m3z morph files computed during CVS.

cleanelreg_flag.title: Clean elastic registration flag
cleanelreg_flag.description: Overwrite / recompute CVS-related elastic registration morph.

m3d_flag.title: Use m3d flag
m3d_flag.description: Use m3d instead of m3z for registration morphs.

openmp.title: OpenMP Nodes
openmp.description: Assign the number of nodes for openmp runs.

nolog_flag.title: No log flag
nolog_flag.description: Do not produce a log file.
